Miscellaneous Mobs.Location: In the Ant Field while an Ant Challenge is active.
Miscellaneous Mobs.Main Feature(s): Higher defense and targets the player.

Miscellaneous Mobs.Location: Randomly appears in all fields except Ant Field
Miscellaneous Mobs.Main Feature(s): Summons Jelly Bean tokens

Miscellaneous Mobs.Location: Werewolf's Cave
Miscellaneous Mobs.Main Feature(s):
400 HP
One-shot kill

Miscellaneous Mobs.Location: Any field except the Ant Field while the Robo Bear Challenge is active.
Miscellaneous Mobs.Main Feature(s):
Passively roams around the field destroying flower patches it passes by although it deals 50 Damage (Increases with level) to the player upon contact with one.
Takes half as much damage from Critical Hits.

Miscellaneous Mobs.Location: Any field except the Ant Field while the Robo Bear Challenge is active.
Miscellaneous Mobs.Main Feature(s):
Shoots a giant cog that destroys flowers and deals 25 damage to the player upon hit. It also deals damage to the player upon contact.
After shooting a cog, it sinks into the ground, rendering it invulnerable as it cannot be targeted or damaged.

Miscellaneous Mobs.Location: Clover Field, Pineapple Patch, Pumpkin Patch or Mountain Top Field while the Robo Bear Challenge is active. (Has a chance to spawn on Rounds, once on 3, 4, 6; another on 12, 13, 14, 16; and lastly one on 21, 22, 23 or 24)
Miscellaneous Mobs.Main Feature(s):
Is a rare mob that appears in the Robo Bear Challenge.
Spawns only 3 times during a Robo Bear Challenge.
It is the only mob in the Robo Bear Challenge that can drop loot.
It passively roams around the field destroying flower patches it passes by.
It functions similarly to a normal Cogmower.
Takes half as much damage from Critical Hits.

Miscellaneous Mobs.Location: Anywhere (including outside of fields) while the Robo Bear Challenge is active.
Miscellaneous Mobs.Main Feature(s):
Shoots a barrage of small projectiles at the player that gives Mechsquito Toxin debuff when hit.
Deals damage upon contact.

Miscellaneous Mobs.Location: Any field (including outside of fields) while the Robo Bear Challenge is active.
Miscellaneous Mobs.Main Feature(s):
Shoots a barrage a barrge of 6 projectiles at the player that gives Mechsquito Toxin debuff when hit.
Deals damage upon contact.
Has a long cooldown between shots.

Miscellaneous Mobs.Location: All fields except the Ant Field.
Miscellaneous Mobs.Main Feature(s):
Summoned by Planters or naturally at quarter past and to, come in different rarities.
Require collecting pollen to defeat.
Rewards and pollen scale up by level and rarity.
